name: The Ghost of Genghis Khan
overview: A mixture of storytelling and arcade action, in which a time portal sends the ghost of Khan hack to his castle. A present day scientist. Dr. Helga Smith (a parapsychologist investigating the incident), is kidnapped by Khan. One or two players assume the role(s) of Keeper(s) of the Time and try to rescue Dr. Smith and send Khan hack in time where he belongs.
